## Introduction
I was thrilled to be part of the January Code Connect Networking Meetup, kicking off an exciting 2023 for 
the Android254 and Kotlin Kenya communities.

This meetup featured a review of community feedback from the year 2022 and suggestions for 2023 including a 
Call for Speakers for the 2023 DroidconKe. 

With fellow amazing panelists Ferdinand Bada, Valentine Rutto and Beatrice Kinya, we did an AMA covering everything from community insights to professional growth. And, of course, plenty of networking opportunities! 

## Presentation
This panel discussion is not recorded. 
It was done to a live audience at iHub, Nairobi Kenya.
